transcript:
Customer: Aapne jis vyakti ko call kiya hai, woh abhi dusre call par vyast hai. Kripya pratiksha kijiye.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir Rahul baat kar raha tha.
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Ek product apna hai na Gopal herbal joint pain relief powder usme deal kar rahe ho aap?
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji bilkul.
Executive: Sir usme deal aap?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Actually kya hai iski category add nahi hai, main add kiye deta hu main iska, theek hai? Kar dijiye.
Customer: Kar dijiye.
Executive: Baki kuch kuch catalog mein aapka maine kaam kiya hai aapka.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai. Aur maine kuch product ye add kiya tha, kuch product ka name mujhe de do aur images provide kar dena aap.
Customer: Theek hai, main bhej dunga aapko.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Aur ek cheez aur hai main aapko bata du. Penis enlargement product ka kya price chal raha hai abhi?
Customer: Kaunsa?
Executive: Penis inla- enlargement product ka.
Customer: 240.
Executive: 240 rupya kya hai? Per bottle hai kya rehta hai? Pack hai?
Customer: Pack.
Executive: Aur anti-aging cream ka?
Customer: 320.
Executive: Kya ye piece mein hai na?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Anti-aging cream aur iska dono ka penis enlargement product ka mujhe photos chahiye hoga. Main bhej deta hu.
Customer: Main bhej deta hu.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Image bol raha tha image main add karu ki main aap add karoge anti-aging cream aur penis enlargement ka?
Customer: Main bhej dunga aapko.
Executive: Toh aap mujhe whatsapp pe drop kar dena main add kar dunga, theek hai? Baki description main add kar du? Description add nahi hai.
Customer: Haan description kar dijiye.
Executive: Description main karta hu anti-aging cream ka mujhe packaging size bata dena kya hai?
Customer: Kiska batana hai?
Executive: Bata de raha hu anti-aging cream ka. Packaging size.
Customer: Packaging size.
Executive: 50 gram, 100 gram, 30 gram kya hai?
Customer: 25 gram.
Executive: Actually kuch maine kaam kiya na product kahin kahin jab size kam aa jaye na uske liye maine kaam kiya toh kuch add kiya product maine. Double double karke isliye main ye hua. Aur skin type batana skin kaisa hai? Oily skin ke liye, dry skin ke liye kya rehta hai?
Customer: Sorry.
Executive: For all skin type, for oily skin, dry skin, normal skin kiske liye hota hai?
Customer: Ye saari skin pe kaam karta hai koi dikkat nahi.
Executive: Gender main, women sab unisex sab mein rahega na?
Customer: Only man.
Executive: Only man. Age group kuch dalna hai? For 30s, for 40s, for 50s?
Customer: 18 plus.
Executive: 18 plus, theek hai. Karni jara complete ho gaya. Aur usage kya hai? Personal parlor? Personal hai na?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Packaging type box?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Made in India?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Theek ho gaya iska maine kar diya. Ek hai penis enlargement ka bata dena. Iska kya form? Oil mein hai ki tablet mein kaisa hai? Spray hai? Kya hai?
Customer: Ye aapka capsule form.
Executive: Capsule form mein. Kuch kuch maine mapping vagera se hi kiye kahin kahin pe se na toh maine correct kiya hai. Aap ye dono ka images mujhe provide kar dena anti-aging aur penis enlargement ka. Teen product jo hai ek hai frank ointment cream. Iska price kya hai? 80 per tube?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Frank ointment cream.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Iska 80 per tube hai kya incorrect dikha raha tha price iska.
Customer: Voice aapki break ho rahi hai.
Executive: Abhi aa rahi hai sahi?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Main bol raha hu ki frank ointment cream ka kya price hai? 80 per tube hai, bottle hai kya hai?
Customer: Tube hai 280.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Maine correct aapka kar diya hai. Baki maine kuch kuch catalog aapke update kiye hai. Ek baar aap dekhna usko, theek hai?
Customer: Ji. Baki sir se ek baar baat kar lena Naveen sir se. Kuch lage toh aap mujhe bata do aapke side se theek tha. Kal Naveen sir ka call aaya tha mere paas, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Kuch lage toh aap mujhe bata do directly unse unko bhi mera number de dena aap.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Aur kuch help toh batao maine kuch kuch aapki mapping sahi ki aapki, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai, baki main aaj catalog ka kaam karwa raha hu. Aap ek baar dekh lena catalog ko, theek hai?
Executive: Theek hai ji.
Executive: D segment kiya nahi kiya?
Customer: [Unintelligible]
summary:
Concerns:

- Category not added for Gopal herbal powder.

- Needs product names and images.

- Wants to know the price of penis enlargement product.

- Wants to know the price of anti-aging cream.

- Wants to know the price of frank ointment cream.



Resolution:

- Executive added the category for Gopal herbal powder.

- Customer agreed to send product names and images.

- Executive updated the price of frank ointment cream.

- Executive updated customer's catalog.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send product images on WhatsApp.

- Customer will check the updated catalog.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, product, price, images, anti-aging cream
